# regression-power

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![build status][travis-image]][travis-url]
[![npm download][download-image]][download-url]

Power Regression.

## Installation

`$ npm i ml-regression-power`

## Usage

This calculates parameters A and B for the equation `y = A * x^B`.
